S

setStateOfAppliances(String) - Method in class HostelRoom
This method accepts the working state of the appliances in the room as a String The String is in the following format "workingCondition0,workingCondition1,workingCondition2" where each of workingCondition0, workingCondition1, workingCondition2 is "true" or "false" Note that the case of any of the workingConditions need not be regular i.e.
